name: Princesses Never Lose!
description:
On the western part of the Stivare Peninsula lies the small kingdom of Torinia. Their princess, Erica, senses the danger to her kingdom, as the peninsula's city-states fall under the influence of a powerful, modernized country.
Seeing this as the potential end of the peninsula's independence, Erica decides to fight for Stivare's dignity.
Her battle to unify the Stivare Peninsula begins!Features:A classic RPG experience
Explore a fantasy world
New Game+ system
Multiple endings
Difficulty system
